author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Bowe Bergdahl: The Fix Is In | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
If only for the sake of maintaining morale in the military, it is absolutely essential that Bowe Bergdahl be executed for his crimes against this country. Yet he will probably walk off scot-free. Jeanine Pirro is right to be enraged:
Watch the latest video at video.foxnews.com On a tip from Bill T.
